title: Vet Services | Good Harbor Holistic Veterinary Care | Traverse City, MI | Dr. Lisa J. Melling DVM CVH
description: Good Harbor Vet is currently accepting new clients who are seeking holistic veterinary care for their pets. We provide in-home veterinary care throughout the Leelanau & great Traverse City, Michigan area.
cleaned_text: Holistic Health Care For Your Pet | | Holistic Veterinary Services Payment Options "It is far more important to know what person has the disease than what disease the person has." -Hippocrates -Hippocrates | | Holistic Veterinary Services Payment Options | | Good Harbor Holistic Veterinary Care offers holistic veterinary services throughout Traverse City and surrounding Northern Michigan communities, providing natural pet care through the use of homeopathy, animal chiropractic care, and nutrition. As of May 2023, Dr. Melling is not accepting new clients in order to provide the best care for her current patients.
